name: EVASION (itch) (Kareen141106)
description:
DO YOU LIKE A  PLATFORMERS - Well This is what you are looking for...

Evasion is a PLATFORMER game which needs a lot of concentration and effort, There will be many Hurdles stopping you from getting to the end. Evade those hurdles and prove that you are the one made for this game. Also this is my first game as an indie game developer please give me feedback by commenting about what you think of the game and what things i should improve. Hope you like the game. :)
